title: Want to buy or trade for VG or VG-EX HOFer with SC350-460 Factory 30 and 42
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: Want to buy or trade for VG or VG-EX HOFer with SC350-460 Factory 30 and 42
posts.post_content:
Hey all,
Anyone want to help me fill a couple slots on the HOFer backs line!?

I’m looking for a couple of the easier backs. I need both the Sweet Cap 350/460 Factory 30 and Factory 42 (not the overprint). Looking for graded VG or VGEX HOFers.  I’ve got some things for trade or might be able to swap player for player if I already have him as a front (and toss in a couple $ for helping me).

Let me know if anyone has anything they could pass along to help me out.

Thanks and any help appreciated,
Bob
PM or email at upperhandisforemost @ yahoo.com 
(let’s see if those spaces in the email keep the ones moving their uncle’s brother’s son’s cards)
